original_title: Dr. Jayasuriya appointed to UK Sigma Risk’s intl. training faculty
original_body_lines: UK based leading training services provider Sigma Risk has announced the appointment of Dr. Dayanath Jayasuriya PC to its international training faculty.

Sigma Risk said that Dr. Jayasuriya is an internationally renowned subject matter expert in compliance, financial crime and regulatory matters. He has served in high profile positions within United Nations in various capacities in Europe, Asia, Africa and South America. He was honoured as President’s Counsel in Sri Lanka due to his services as a prominent lawyer. He has served as Chairman of Securities and Exchange Commission in Sri Lanka. His career spans many international assignments around the world.
“Sigma Risk is looking forward to serve our clients in close collaboration with Dr. Dayanath Jayasuriya,” the company said in a statement.
